list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Add contact info and update version for various services
Several service updates have been made: the Cards, Loans, and Accounts services now include contact info with relevant DTO alteration. Moreover, new API endpoints for 'build-info', 'java-info', and 'contact-info' are added to retrieve build version, Java version, and contact information. Corresponding '.yml' files are also updated or added to support multiple profiles, set the active profile, and define additional properties. IDE-specific files and modules are updated or deleted as needed.
